Description:
Detects the registration of the security event source VSSAudit. It would usually trigger when volume shadow copy operations happen.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g, Open Threat Research (OTR)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: VSSAudit Security Event Source Registration
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where auditsourcename = 'vssaudit' and (eventid = '4904' or eventid = '4905')
